dust:
(:action dust_room
    :parameters (?p - person ?r - room)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?r) (not (dust_free ?r)))
    :effect (dust_free ?r)
)

(:action empty_waste_basket
    :parameters (?p - person ?wb - waste_basket ?tb - trash_bag ?r - room)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?r) (at ?wb ?r) (at ?tb ?r) (full ?wb))
    :effect (and (not (full ?wb)) (full ?tb))
)

(:action clean_glass_surface
    :parameters (?p - person ?cs - glass_surface ?sc - spray_cleaner ?r - rag ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?l) (at ?cs ?l) (at ?sc ?l) (at ?r ?l) (not (clean ?cs)))
    :effect (and (clean ?cs) (used ?sc) (used ?r))
)
enjoy:
(:action enjoy_clean_home
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (and (clean_home))
    :effect (relaxed ?p)
)
```

These actions capture the intent and logic of each step in the task of cleaning your home efficiently. The preconditions and effects are based on the entity states provided and the descriptions of the steps.
